C

checkPressedButtonsWin() - Method in class mini_project.Board
checks if all the button without bombs have been pressed If so the game is won
CheckSurroudingFieldForZeroAndExpose(int, int) - Method in class mini_project.Board
this is what checks if a surrounding button has "0" is so expose it and checkZeroAndExpose around the exposed buttons until there is no more "0"'s
checkZeroAndExpose(int, int) - Method in class mini_project.Board
first calls the exposeTheSurroundingField because field[x][y] has surroundingBombs(x,y)=0 then calls the surrounding bombs method to check if the newly exposed fields still have surroundingBombs(x,y)=0\ the process is repeated until there are no more fields with 0 unexposed
clickedNoFlagNoBomb() - Method in class mini_project.Board
changes the color of the buttons and if [x][y] is "0" set the label to nothing
